mapper.insert: INSERT INTO voc_tb (phone_number, email, type, title, content, category_id, member_id, ticket_id) VALUES ('${phoneNumber}', '${email}', '${type}', '${title}', #{content}, '${categoryId}', '${memberId}', NULLIF('${ticketId}', ''))
mapper.select: SELECT v.*, c.name AS category_name, c.id AS category_id, a.id AS answer_id, a.content AS answer_content, a.created_at AS answer_created_at FROM voc_tb AS v JOIN voc_category_tb AS c ON v.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN voc_answer_tb AS a ON v.id = a.voc_id WHERE member_id = '${memberId}' ORDER BY v.id DESC
